# Run Code
```{r, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

```{r, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
mpg
```

```{r}
kable(mpg[1:5,], caption = "A table generated from code")
```

```{r, fig.cap = "A graph"}
ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class))
```
